topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 2.0: Removing an Existing ESX Host from a Cluster

body.p:
The process for removing an existing ESX host from cluster is as follows:
Right click and put the host in the maintenance mode. This will automatically migrate all the tenant VMs except OVSvApp.
Cancel the maintenance mode task.
Right click the ovsvapp VM (IP Address) and select Power Off.
Right click and select Delete from Disk.
Right click the Host and select Enter Maintenance Mode.
Disconnect the VM, Right click and select Disconnect.
